name: Ace Pilot
description: You are most at home in the pilot’s seat.

theme_knowledge.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Piloting checks, and Piloting is a class skill for you. If it is already a class skill, you instead gain a +1 bonus to Piloting checks.

abilities.name: Lone Wolf
abilities.description: You can reroll a failed Piloting check once per day.

abilities.name: Need for Speed
abilities.description: Your vehicle’s speed increases by 10%.

abilities.name: Master Pilot
abilities.description: You can take 10 on Piloting checks even when threatened.

name: Bounty Hunter
description: You track and capture fugitives.

theme_knowledge.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Survival checks, and Survival is a class skill for you. If it is already a class skill, you instead gain a +1 bonus to Survival checks.

abilities.name: Relentless Pursuit
abilities.description: Track targets in urban environments without penalties.

abilities.name: Subdue
abilities.description: Deal nonlethal damage without penalties.

abilities.name: Master Tracker
abilities.description: Track across any terrain without penalties.

name: Icon
description: You are a widely recognized celebrity.

theme_knowledge.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Culture checks, and Culture is a class skill for you. If it is already a class skill, you instead gain a +1 bonus to Culture checks.

abilities.name: Celebrity Advantage
abilities.description: Gain bonus to Bluff and Diplomacy in public.

abilities.name: Mass Following
abilities.description: Inspire crowds with your presence.

abilities.name: Legend
abilities.description: Become an iconic figure gaining unique story influence.

name: Mercenary
description: You are a soldier of fortune.

theme_knowledge.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Athletics checks, and Athletics is a class skill for you. If it is already a class skill, you instead gain a +1 bonus to Athletics checks.

abilities.name: Hard Knocks
abilities.description: Reroll failed Strength-based skill check once per day.

abilities.name: War-Hardened
abilities.description: Gain resistance to fear and pain.

abilities.name: Battle Master
abilities.description: Gain a morale bonus to damage rolls.

name: Outlaw
description: You operate outside the law.

theme_knowledge.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Stealth checks, and Stealth is a class skill for you. If it is already a class skill, you instead gain a +1 bonus to Stealth checks.

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: Take no damage on successful Reflex save.

abilities.name: Concealed Identity
abilities.description: Mask your presence from detection.

abilities.name: Most Wanted
abilities.description: Your notoriety gives you leverage.

name: Priest
description: You are a devoted servant of a deity.

theme_knowledge.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Mysticism checks, and Mysticism is a class skill for you. If it is already a class skill, you instead gain a +1 bonus to Mysticism checks.

abilities.name: Divine Boon
abilities.description: Call upon your deity for assistance.

abilities.name: Spiritual Shield
abilities.description: Gain resistance against supernatural effects.

abilities.name: Chosen Vessel
abilities.description: Channel divine power directly.

name: Scholar
description: You are a deep thinker and researcher.

theme_knowledge.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Life Science or Physical Science checks, and one of these is a class skill for you. If it already is, you instead gain a +1 bonus.

abilities.name: Researcher
abilities.description: Reduce time needed to research by 50%.

abilities.name: Scientific Insight
abilities.description: Gain insight bonus on science-related checks.

abilities.name: Master Scholar
abilities.description: Recall obscure facts automatically.

name: Spacefarer
description: You are a wanderer of the stars.

theme_knowledge.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Physical Science checks, and Physical Science is a class skill for you. If it is already a class skill, you instead gain a +1 bonus to Physical Science checks.

abilities.name: Zero-G Training
abilities.description: Ignore penalties in zero gravity.

abilities.name: Void Survivor
abilities.description: Gain environmental immunities in space.

abilities.name: Starborn
abilities.description: Your connection to the cosmos enhances your resolve.

name: Themeless
description: You do not fit into any predefined mold.

theme_knowledge.description: You gain a +1 bonus to any one skill, and it becomes a class skill for you.

abilities.name: Flexibility
abilities.description: Choose a skill bonus or reroll ability daily.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: Switch out feats during rest periods.

abilities.name: Universal Talent
abilities.description: Gain an extra feat of your choice.

name: Career Trooper
description: You are a career member of a military and have been embroiled in conflicts and military bureaucracy for many years.

theme_knowledge.description: Reduce the DC of any Culture or Diplomacy check to gather or recall information about enemy troop sizes and tactics by 5. Piloting is a class skill for you, though if it is a class skill from your class, gain a +1 bonus to Piloting checks instead.

abilities.name: Adaptive Kit
abilities.description: You can modify your armor to gain the benefits of one set of environmental clothing appropriate to the area’s climate. This adaptation reduces the armor check penalty by 1 for 24 hours. You can adapt your armor only once per week.

abilities.name: Indefatigable
abilities.description: Once per day as a move action, you can regain Stamina Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier.

abilities.name: Determined Upkeep
abilities.description: Twice per day, you can spend 10 minutes maintaining your gear to regain 1 Resolve Point (doesn’t count as resting to regain SP).

name: Athlete
description: You are a professional competitor and an expert in physical finesse or brute strength, providing you advantages in battle.

theme_knowledge.description: You are or were a professional-level athlete with specialized physical skills.

abilities.name: Athletic Training
abilities.description: You can reroll a failed Athletics check once per day.

abilities.name: Enduring Performance
abilities.description: Reduce the penalties from fatigue by half.

abilities.name: Champion's Resilience
abilities.description: Gain immunity to the exhausted condition.

name: Battle Medic
description: You’ve been trained to treat combat wounds on and off the battlefield.

theme_knowledge.description: You gain insight into treating injuries under duress. Medicine is a class skill for you.

abilities.name: Combat Triage
abilities.description: You can attempt Medicine checks to treat deadly wounds as a move action.

abilities.name: Field Surgeon
abilities.description: You no longer take penalties for treating creatures in combat.

abilities.name: Master Healer
abilities.description: Once per day, you can automatically succeed at a Medicine check.

name: Beastblood
description: You have a powerful affinity with the beasts of the wild.

theme_knowledge.description: You understand the behavior of wild animals instinctively.

abilities.name: Animal Empathy
abilities.description: You gain a +2 bonus to checks to influence or understand animals.

abilities.name: Beastfriend
abilities.description: You can attempt to command a creature as if using the charm monster spell once per day.

abilities.name: Wild Incarnate
abilities.description: Animals will not attack you unless provoked.

name: Biotechnician
description: You are a biotech researcher or avid user of such tech, constantly seeking new augmentations.

theme_knowledge.description: You’re proficient with biotechnology and modifying biological systems.

abilities.name: Biotech Familiarity
abilities.description: Reduce the cost of biotech augmentations by 10%.

abilities.name: Efficient Integration
abilities.description: Install or remove biotech augmentations in half the time.

abilities.name: Living Innovation
abilities.description: You gain an additional biotech augmentation slot.

name: Bouncer
description: You work the nightlife scene and know how to handle yourself and others when things get rough.

theme_knowledge.description: You have experience maintaining order and handling unruly guests.

abilities.name: Tavern Tough
abilities.description: You gain a +2 bonus to KAC against grapple and bull rush attempts.

abilities.name: Calm the Crowd
abilities.description: You can use Intimidate to defuse or redirect hostile crowds.

abilities.name: Legendary Bouncer
abilities.description: You are immune to being moved against your will.

name: Bounty Hunter
description: Almost nothing will stop you from tracking down your quarries and returning them—dead or alive.

theme_knowledge.description: You excel at identifying and apprehending individuals.

abilities.name: Tracking Specialist
abilities.description: You can track targets through urban environments without penalty.

abilities.name: Pinpoint Target
abilities.description: You can reroll a missed ranged attack against a flat-footed enemy once per day.

abilities.name: Relentless Pursuit
abilities.description: You are not slowed by difficult terrain while pursuing a bounty.

name: Bureaucrat
description: You bring your no-nonsense ability to cut through red tape to bear in surprising ways.

theme_knowledge.description: You have experience navigating administrative systems and hierarchical organizations.

abilities.name: Efficient Paperwork
abilities.description: You reduce the time and cost of acquiring permits, licenses, and similar paperwork by half.

abilities.name: Bureaucratic Immunity
abilities.description: You can talk your way out of legal trouble once per week.

abilities.name: Policy Mastermind
abilities.description: You gain +2 to Diplomacy and Sense Motive checks when dealing with officials.

name: Colonist
description: You have an unquenchable trailblazer’s spirit and the skills to carve out new settlements.

theme_knowledge.description: You have knowledge of survival and logistical planning for undeveloped regions.

abilities.name: Pathfinder
abilities.description: You ignore natural difficult terrain when traveling with a group.

abilities.name: Settler's Resolve
abilities.description: You can treat natural 1s on Fortitude saves as natural 10s once per day.

abilities.name: Wilderness Veteran
abilities.description: Gain a +4 bonus to Survival checks in untamed regions.

name: Corporate Agent
description: You are an agent of a corporation, which relies on your negotiation and cunning to advance its agendas.

theme_knowledge.description: You’re well-versed in business practices and corporate politics.

abilities.name: Corporate Discount
abilities.description: Reduce the price of goods by 10% when purchasing for your corporation.

abilities.name: Executive Privilege
abilities.description: Once per day, call in a corporate favor for minor assistance.

abilities.name: CEO Material
abilities.description: You gain a +4 bonus to Charisma-based checks in business dealings.

name: Crisis Refugee
description: The Drift Crisis cut you off from the place you called home.

theme_knowledge.description: You survived displacement during the Drift Crisis, gaining resilience and adaptability.

abilities.name: Resilient Spirit
abilities.description: Once per day, reroll a failed Will save against fear or despair effects.

abilities.name: Unshaken
abilities.description: Gain immunity to the shaken condition.

abilities.name: Unbreakable Will
abilities.description: Gain a +4 bonus to saves against mind-affecting effects.

name: Cult Hunter
description: Your life’s work is to ferret out cults and free those who have fallen into their clutches.

theme_knowledge.description: You are familiar with cult behavior, rituals, and infiltration tactics.

abilities.name: Discern Deception
abilities.description: You can roll Sense Motive twice and take the better result once per day.

abilities.name: Mind Shield
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus to saves against charm and compulsion effects.

abilities.name: Cultural Cleanser
abilities.description: Once per week, you can negate a charm effect on another creature as a standard action.

name: Cultist
description: You served a hidden religion or organization with questionable goals.

theme_knowledge.description: You are versed in secret rituals and underground networks.

abilities.name: Hidden Agenda
abilities.description: You gain a +2 bonus to Bluff checks when hiding your true motives.

abilities.name: Dark Channel
abilities.description: You can use sending once per day to contact other cult members.

abilities.name: Devoted Sacrifice
abilities.description: Once per day, reduce damage to 0 from an effect that would reduce you to 0 HP.

name: Cyberborn
description: You’ve had some form of cybernetic augmentation since you were very young.

theme_knowledge.description: You are intimately familiar with cybernetic systems and maintenance.

abilities.name: Integrated Function
abilities.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Engineering checks related to cybernetics.

abilities.name: Cybernetic Efficiency
abilities.description: Once per day, reroll a failed saving throw caused by system malfunction.

abilities.name: Machine Fusion
abilities.description: You gain an additional cybernetic slot and reduce usage time by half.

name: Death-Touched
description: You have an affinity for the dead and undead.

theme_knowledge.description: You possess unnatural familiarity with necromantic forces and undead beings.

abilities.name: Chill of the Grave
abilities.description: Gain cold resistance 5 and +2 on saving throws vs. death effects.

abilities.name: Ghost Whisper
abilities.description: Once per day, speak with dead (as spell) without material components.

abilities.name: Deathless Fortitude
abilities.description: Gain DR 5/magic and immunity to energy drain.

name: Diplomat
description: You strive for peace and amicable solutions even in tense situations.

theme_knowledge.description: You are skilled in negotiation, peacemaking, and cultural protocol.

abilities.name: Smooth Talker
abilities.description: Once per day, reroll a failed Diplomacy check.

abilities.name: Silver Tongue
abilities.description: Diplomacy checks take half the usual time.

abilities.name: Universal Appeaser
abilities.description: You are treated as having a helpful attitude by default when first meeting NPCs.

name: Dragonblood
description: You can feel draconic magic pulsing through your veins.

theme_knowledge.description: You have an innate understanding of dragons and their magic.

abilities.name: Draconic Affinity
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against breath weapons.

abilities.name: Scaled Resilience
abilities.description: Gain energy resistance 5 to one type of energy associated with a dragon.

abilities.name: Ancient Heritage
abilities.description: Once per day, you can cast dragon breath as a spell-like ability.

name: Dream Prophet
description: You were drawn to Liavara by the Dreamers’ songs.

theme_knowledge.description: You are attuned to the mystical dreams of the cosmos.

abilities.name: Oneiromancer
abilities.description: You gain +2 to saves against sleep and illusion effects.

abilities.name: Shared Visions
abilities.description: You can grant a reroll on a Will save to an ally once per day.

abilities.name: Dream Echo
abilities.description: Once per day, you may automatically succeed at one failed Will save.

name: Drift Crashed
description: You were aboard a starship when the Drift Crash occurred.

theme_knowledge.description: You developed instincts during your harrowing time in the Drift.

abilities.name: Crisis Navigator
abilities.description: You gain a +2 bonus to Piloting checks in hazardous conditions.

abilities.name: Temporal Sense
abilities.description: You can detect minor temporal anomalies (as per the detect affliction spell).

abilities.name: Drift Survivor
abilities.description: Gain immunity to flat-footed condition in the surprise round.

name: Esper
description: Monsters are out there. They seek to invade your mind and destroy all that lies within.

theme_knowledge.description: You have developed mental fortitude and sensitivity to mental influence.

abilities.name: Mental Resistance
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus on saves vs. mind-affecting effects.

abilities.name: Psychic Echo
abilities.description: Once per day, reflect a mind-affecting spell back at the caster.

abilities.name: Sanity Anchor
abilities.description: Gain immunity to confusion and insanity effects.

name: Gambler
description: You’ve mastered the odds and your luck often saves the day.

theme_knowledge.description: You are skilled at reading probabilities and exploiting chance.

abilities.name: Lucky Break
abilities.description: Once per day, reroll a failed skill check.

abilities.name: High Stakes
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus on Bluff and Sense Motive checks when gambling.

abilities.name: Desna's Favor
abilities.description: Once per day, treat a d20 roll as if you had rolled a natural 20.

name: Giantblood
description: You can trace your ancestry to giants.

theme_knowledge.description: You possess knowledge of giant kin and their mighty heritage.

abilities.name: Titan Strength
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Athletics checks involving lifting, pushing, or pulling.

abilities.name: Hefty Endurance
abilities.description: Reduce falling damage by half and carry capacity is doubled.

abilities.name: Colossal Might
abilities.description: Once per day, deal double damage on a melee attack.

name: Gladiator
description: You are a veteran of the public blood sport industry.

theme_knowledge.description: You know the ins and outs of arena combat and performance.

abilities.name: Crowd Favorite
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus on checks to perform or intimidate in combat.

abilities.name: Showstopper
abilities.description: Once per combat, demoralize all enemies within 30 feet as a move action.

abilities.name: Champion's Presence
abilities.description: Allies within 30 feet gain +1 morale bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: Grifter
description: Swindling and ingratiating yourself to others are your specialties.

theme_knowledge.description: You’re an expert in con games, lies, and getting people to trust you.

abilities.name: Silver Lies
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Bluff checks to convince others of outlandish claims.

abilities.name: Fake Identity
abilities.description: Maintain a cover identity that resists verification (DC +10).

abilities.name: Master Manipulator
abilities.description: Once per day, suggest a course of action to an NPC as per suggestion spell.

name: Guard
description: You are a vigilant protector of your clients and friends.

theme_knowledge.description: You are trained in tactics to defend others and recognize threats.

abilities.name: Protective Reflexes
abilities.description: Once per day, grant an adjacent ally +2 AC as a reaction.

abilities.name: Zone of Safety
abilities.description: Allies within 10 feet gain +1 to saving throws.

abilities.name: Unyielding Sentinel
abilities.description: You are immune to the flat-footed condition and gain +2 to saves vs. fear.

name: Icon
description: You are a popular and respected celebrity within colonized space.

theme_knowledge.description: You know how to manage your brand and public presence.

abilities.name: Famous Face
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to Diplomacy checks with fans and media.

abilities.name: Media Spin
abilities.description: Once per day, shift attitude of a hostile NPC by one step with a Diplomacy check.

abilities.name: Living Legend
abilities.description: Your fame grants +2 morale bonus on all Charisma-based checks.

name: Law Officer
description: You are an enforcer of law and protector of the public.

theme_knowledge.description: You are trained in criminal procedures, codes, and combat tactics.

abilities.name: Commanding Presence
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Intimidate checks to enforce lawful orders.

abilities.name: Hold the Line
abilities.description: Allies within 10 feet gain +2 CMD against bull rush and reposition.

abilities.name: Marshal Authority
abilities.description: Once per day, grant allies a +2 bonus on attack rolls for 1 minute.

name: Mercenary
description: You are a trained soldier of fortune who works well with companions in battle.

theme_knowledge.description: You know the ways of combat contracts, battlefield tactics, and team cohesion.

abilities.name: Battle Hardened
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against fear effects.

abilities.name: Coordinated Assault
abilities.description: Allies gain +1 to attacks against enemies you threaten.

abilities.name: Wartime Veteran
abilities.description: You gain DR 5/- and a +2 bonus on all saving throws during combat.

name: Noble Scion
description: You were born into power and privilege and navigate high society with ease.

theme_knowledge.description: You are skilled in etiquette, history, and manipulation of political systems.

abilities.name: Aristocratic Favor
abilities.description: Once per day, call in a favor from a noble contact for minor assistance.

abilities.name: High Society Savvy
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Culture checks related to noble or elite groups.

abilities.name: Born Leader
abilities.description: Allies within 30 feet gain +1 morale bonus to saving throws while you are conscious.

name: Opportunist
description: For many, a crisis is nothing less than an opportunity.

theme_knowledge.description: You are adept at finding advantage in chaos and navigating uncertainty.

abilities.name: Seize the Moment
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to initiative checks and Sense Motive in tense situations.

abilities.name: Exploit Weakness
abilities.description: Once per day, treat an enemy as flat-footed for one round.

abilities.name: Crisis Mastermind
abilities.description: Gain +2 to all skill checks while in a critical situation (GM’s discretion).

name: Outlaw
description: Whether guilty or not, you are a wanted criminal.

theme_knowledge.description: You know how to survive in the underworld and avoid detection.

abilities.name: Marked Fugitive
abilities.description: You gain +2 bonus to Disguise and Stealth checks while evading pursuit.

abilities.name: Hide in Plain Sight
abilities.description: You can attempt Stealth checks even while being observed, once per day.

abilities.name: Ghost in the System
abilities.description: You are immune to divination spells and tracking by magical means once per day.

name: Paranormal Investigator
description: You seek out what goes bump in the night and expose it to the light.

theme_knowledge.description: You have extensive knowledge of strange creatures, magic, and unexplained phenomena.

abilities.name: Sixth Sense
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus on Perception and Mysticism checks to detect magical anomalies.

abilities.name: Warding Ritual
abilities.description: You can cast protection from evil or chaos once per day as a spell-like ability.

abilities.name: Occult Expertise
abilities.description: You gain +4 bonus to identify or counter supernatural effects.

name: Personal Trainer
description: You’ve made a career out of pushing yourself and others to peak fitness.

theme_knowledge.description: You are skilled in kinesiology, endurance routines, and motivational techniques.

abilities.name: Condition Coach
abilities.description: Once per day, grant an ally a +2 bonus to Athletics or Acrobatics for 1 hour.

abilities.name: Push Through
abilities.description: You may ignore the fatigued condition once per day for up to 10 minutes.

abilities.name: Peak Performance
abilities.description: You and adjacent allies gain +2 bonus to Strength and Constitution-based checks.

name: Pickpocket
description: You’ve got sticky fingers and a knack for not getting caught.

theme_knowledge.description: You are talented at sleight of hand, distractions, and escaping notice.

abilities.name: Sticky Fingers
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to Sleight of Hand checks to lift small objects unnoticed.

abilities.name: Light Touch
abilities.description: You can plant or retrieve objects on creatures as a move action without penalty.

abilities.name: Master Thief
abilities.description: You can take 10 on Sleight of Hand checks, even in combat.

name: Planar Traveler
description: You feel at home across the planes, whether or not you're a native of the Material Plane.

theme_knowledge.description: You have a deep understanding of planar cosmology and the hazards of other realms.

abilities.name: Planar Resilience
abilities.description: Gain resistance 5 to one energy type associated with your favorite plane.

abilities.name: Plane Shift Adaptation
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus to saves against planar hazards and environmental effects.

abilities.name: Harmonized Existence
abilities.description: Once per day, reduce all planar travel mishap chances to 0% for you and your allies.

name: Priest
description: Your devotion to a religion or philosophy is central to your identity.

theme_knowledge.description: You have deep religious or philosophical training and are practiced in rites and beliefs.

abilities.name: Ritual Expertise
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Culture checks when dealing with religious institutions or texts.

abilities.name: Channel Conviction
abilities.description: Once per day, reroll a failed saving throw against a compulsion or charm effect.

abilities.name: Spiritual Anchor
abilities.description: All allies within 10 feet gain +2 on Will saves while you are conscious.

name: Prisoner
description: You escaped incarceration or lived under forced confinement and emerged stronger.

theme_knowledge.description: You understand confinement tactics and the psychology of captivity.

abilities.name: Scarred Will
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects.

abilities.name: Iron Resolve
abilities.description: Once per day, negate a condition imposed by fear or pain.

abilities.name: Hardened Survivor
abilities.description: Gain DR 5/— and ignore movement penalties from being entangled or grappled.

name: Prole
description: You’re a hardworking cog in the corporate machine.

theme_knowledge.description: You are experienced in logistics, task efficiency, and workplace survival.

abilities.name: Efficient Worker
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Profession checks and reduce task completion time by 10%.

abilities.name: Resourceful
abilities.description: Once per day, treat a failed Profession or Engineering check as if you rolled a 10.

abilities.name: Unionized Might
abilities.description: You and adjacent allies gain a +1 morale bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: Quartermaster
description: You are always prepared with the right gear for the job.

theme_knowledge.description: You are trained in inventory systems, logistics, and provisioning.

abilities.name: Gear Savant
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Engineering checks when identifying or repairing equipment.

abilities.name: Inventory Trick
abilities.description: Once per day, produce a consumable worth up to 1,000 credits from your reserves.

abilities.name: Logistical Genius
abilities.description: Allies within 30 feet gain +2 to attack rolls with gear you provide them.

name: Rancher
description: You grew up tending animals and managing large plots of land in remote areas.

theme_knowledge.description: You’re familiar with animal care, agricultural cycles, and outdoor survival.

abilities.name: Animal Sense
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to Survival checks when interacting with animals or in wilderness areas.

abilities.name: Frontier Fortitude
abilities.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Fortitude saves in natural environments.

abilities.name: Master of the Range
abilities.description: You and allies within 30 feet gain +2 morale bonus on ranged attacks while outdoors.

name: Roboticist
description: You are fascinated by constructs and artificial life.

theme_knowledge.description: You understand robotics, AI behavior, and maintenance of mechanical beings.

abilities.name: Mechanized Insight
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to Engineering checks involving constructs or tech.

abilities.name: Override Subroutines
abilities.description: Once per day, command a construct to halt or reroute behavior for 1 round (Will negates).

abilities.name: Artificial Ally
abilities.description: Create a temporary drone ally once per day that lasts for 10 minutes.

name: Scholar
description: Your academic curiosity drives you to collect and apply knowledge.

theme_knowledge.description: You are deeply educated in one or more fields of study.

abilities.name: Informed Approach
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus on skill checks when researching or recalling knowledge.

abilities.name: Strategic Recall
abilities.description: Once per day, reroll a failed skill check to identify a creature, hazard, or item.

abilities.name: Living Encyclopedia
abilities.description: You can take 20 on any untrained Knowledge skill check once per day.

name: Sensate
description: You crave new experiences and exposure to the unknown.

theme_knowledge.description: You have a wide base of sensory knowledge and enjoy pushing your limits.

abilities.name: Eager Explorer
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to Culture and Survival checks in unfamiliar settings.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Curiosity
abilities.description: You can take 10 on any Culture or Life Science check, even in combat.

abilities.name: Multisensory Savant
abilities.description: You gain blindsight (30 feet) for 1 minute once per day.

name: Solar Disciple
description: You are devoted to solar mysteries, whether religious or scientific.

theme_knowledge.description: You have studied the sun's role in various systems and beliefs.

abilities.name: Solar Channel
abilities.description: You gain +2 bonus to saving throws against cold effects and low temperatures.

abilities.name: Radiant Core
abilities.description: Emit bright light in a 30-foot radius for 1 hour once per day; grants +1 morale bonus to allies' Will saves.

abilities.name: Solar Avatar
abilities.description: Gain immunity to the blinded condition and solar environmental hazards once per day for 1 hour.

name: Space Pirate
description: You’re a rebellious corsair living by your own rules among the stars.

theme_knowledge.description: You’re familiar with the shadowy rules of pirate society, smuggling routes, and starship theft.

abilities.name: Daring Boarding
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to Piloting or Acrobatics checks when boarding or breaching starships.

abilities.name: Smuggler’s Instinct
abilities.description: Once per day, reroll a failed Sleight of Hand or Stealth check.

abilities.name: Pirate Legend
abilities.description: Allies gain +2 morale bonus to initiative rolls when you are present during space combat.

name: Spacefarer
description: You thrive on interstellar travel and exploration.

theme_knowledge.description: You’re adept at navigation, void survival, and interplanetary diplomacy.

abilities.name: Void Conditioning
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to saving throws against vacuum exposure and radiation.

abilities.name: Gravitic Stability
abilities.description: You ignore difficult terrain caused by low or zero gravity.

abilities.name: Interstellar Coordination
abilities.description: Once per day, reduce a Drift travel mishap chance to 0%.

name: Spectra Scion
description: You share a mystical bond with the planar beings known as spectra.

theme_knowledge.description: You understand Drift phenomena and the workings of spectra within the plane.

abilities.name: Spectral Guidance
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to Mysticism checks when dealing with Drift-related phenomena.

abilities.name: Planar Harmony
abilities.description: You gain resistance 5 to force damage and +1 to Will saves while in the Drift.

abilities.name: Spectra Ally
abilities.description: Once per day, summon a spectra ally for 1 minute to assist you.

name: Starwalker
description: You’ve walked through the dark, empty places between the stars.

theme_knowledge.description: You have deep familiarity with vacuum conditions, asteroid navigation, and zero-gravity tactics.

abilities.name: Vacuum Tolerance
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Athletics checks in low or zero-gravity environments.

abilities.name: Solar Drift
abilities.description: Once per day, negate gravity penalties for 1 hour.

abilities.name: Darkspace Survivor
abilities.description: Gain immunity to environmental hazards from vacuum for 10 minutes per day.

name: Stormrunner
description: You’ve mastered movement through violent weather and dangerous skies.

theme_knowledge.description: You understand atmospheric patterns, weather manipulation, and aerial traversal.

abilities.name: Wind Dancer
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to Acrobatics or Survival checks when in severe weather.

abilities.name: Lightning Reflexes
abilities.description: Once per day, gain evasion for 1 round after succeeding a Reflex save.

abilities.name: Stormshaper
abilities.description: You and allies within 30 feet gain electricity resistance 5 and are unaffected by natural winds.

name: Street Magician
description: You perform close-up magic tricks and misdirection, often with a deeper understanding of real magic.

theme_knowledge.description: You’ve honed your sleight of hand and can seamlessly blend mundane tricks with actual spellcasting.

abilities.name: Trickster’s Edge
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus on Bluff checks and Sleight of Hand checks in urban areas.

abilities.name: Spell Feint
abilities.description: Once per day, cast a 1st-level illusion spell without provoking attacks of opportunity.

abilities.name: Master of Illusions
abilities.description: You can reroll failed Will saves against illusion spells once per day.

name: Street Rat
description: Scrappy and streetwise, you survived harsh urban environments by wit and grit.

theme_knowledge.description: You are well-versed in navigating back alleys, avoiding patrols, and scavenging resources.

abilities.name: Urban Camouflage
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to Stealth and Survival checks in urban settings.

abilities.name: Narrow Escape
abilities.description: Once per day, you can automatically succeed on an Acrobatics check to move through a threatened space.

abilities.name: Ghost of the City
abilities.description: You can reroll one failed Stealth check per day and gain a +5 bonus on that reroll.

name: Tempered Pilgrim
description: You’ve undergone a personal Tempering, expanding your worldview and gaining unique insights.

theme_knowledge.description: You’re familiar with kasathan philosophies and the teachings of many cultures.

abilities.name: Cultural Fluency
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to Culture checks and reduce DC to recall information about alien civilizations.

abilities.name: Philosophical Calm
abilities.description: Once per day, reroll a failed Will save against fear or emotion effects.

abilities.name: Enlightened Wanderer
abilities.description: You are immune to confusion effects and reduce Diplomacy DCs by 2.

name: Themeless
description: You don’t fit any predefined mold. Your experiences are uniquely yours.

theme_knowledge.description: You rely on general versatility rather than specialized training.

abilities.name: Jack of All Trades
abilities.description: You can use all skills untrained.

abilities.name: Adaptive Learning
abilities.description: Select any one feat for which you meet the prerequisites. You gain this feat.

abilities.name: Master Generalist
abilities.description: You gain a +1 insight bonus to all skill checks.

name: Tinker
description: You are an inventive builder of gadgets, micro-devices, and helpful constructs.

theme_knowledge.description: You are an expert in small-scale mechanics and fabrication using UPBs.

abilities.name: Gadgeteer
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to Engineering checks to build or repair technological items.

abilities.name: Quick Fix
abilities.description: Once per day, repair 1d8 HP to a construct or device as a move action.

abilities.name: Innovator Supreme
abilities.description: Once per day, reduce crafting time for a technological item by 75%.

name: Vaster
description: You come from a system far beyond the Pact Worlds, bringing unique experiences with you.

theme_knowledge.description: You’re familiar with remote systems, alien environments, and obscure histories.

abilities.name: Star-Born Insight
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus on Culture checks regarding non-Pact Worlds civilizations.

abilities.name: Exotic Knowledge
abilities.description: Once per day, reroll a failed Culture or Life Science check.

abilities.name: Beyond the Stars
abilities.description: You gain a +2 bonus to all saving throws against effects originating from extraplanar or alien creatures.

name: Vidgamer
description: You’ve spent years mastering virtual games of all kinds, sharpening your reflexes and strategy.

theme_knowledge.description: You are highly skilled at pattern recognition, tactical thinking, and rapid hand-eye coordination.

abilities.name: Quick Reflexes
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus on initiative rolls and reflex saves in virtual or simulated environments.

abilities.name: Simulation Mastery
abilities.description: Once per day, gain a +2 bonus to a Computers check related to virtual systems or VR.

abilities.name: Digital Dominance
abilities.description: You cannot be flat-footed or surprised while in digital simulations or VR.

name: Void Nomad
description: You thrive in the black of space, adapting to the void like a second home.

theme_knowledge.description: You’re intimately familiar with life support systems, starship maintenance, and deep-space travel.

abilities.name: Void Walker
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus on Engineering checks for void survival gear and systems.

abilities.name: Zero-G Adaptation
abilities.description: You ignore the off-kilter condition in zero gravity.

abilities.name: Vacuum Mastery
abilities.description: You are immune to the environmental effects of vacuum and do not need to make saving throws against them.

name: Wild Warden
description: You protect nature and thrive in untamed environments.

theme_knowledge.description: You are deeply knowledgeable in wilderness survival, animal behavior, and natural terrain.

abilities.name: Natural Camouflage
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus on Survival and Stealth checks in natural environments.

abilities.name: Beast Empathy
abilities.description: You can attempt Diplomacy checks to influence the attitude of animals and beasts.

abilities.name: Guardian of the Wilds
abilities.description: You and allies within 30 feet gain resistance 5 to acid, cold, and fire damage while in natural settings.

name: Xenoarchaeologist
description: You delve into the ruins and artifacts of alien civilizations.

theme_knowledge.description: You specialize in understanding alien languages, cultures, and ancient technology.

abilities.name: Ancient Clues
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus on Culture checks related to alien artifacts and ruins.

abilities.name: Artifact Affinity
abilities.description: Once per day, reroll a failed Mysticism or Engineering check to identify ancient tech.

abilities.name: Alien Historian
abilities.description: Gain a +2 insight bonus to saves against ancient alien magic or technology.

name: Xenoseeker
description: You live to encounter and understand new alien lifeforms.

theme_knowledge.description: You have extensive familiarity with alien physiology, culture, and diplomacy.

abilities.name: First Contact Specialist
abilities.description: Gain +2 bonus to Diplomacy and Life Science checks involving alien creatures.

abilities.name: Open Mind
abilities.description: Once per day, reroll a failed Will save against enchantment or mind-affecting effects.

abilities.name: Galactic Ambassador
abilities.description: You gain a +2 morale bonus to Diplomacy checks and can cast tongues once per day as a spell-like ability.
